title: Finding a North Korean to play clash
body:
Hello, me and my friends are looking for 1 or 2 more members to play clash :) We dont mind any roles nor ranks and hope to have fun. We need someone who can play at AEST 7pm / 9PM in NZ. 
It would be ideal to find someone who also live in New Zealand ;)

Add AlexDotP

Love u uwu <3

^ì˜¤^b
